subject: pedel software firmware issue
description_text:
Moved my pro pedals (aprox 2 years old) to new computer.  Old silver style load cell.

Down loaded your new software and the old style software to new computer. Neither work.
Old software says I need v3.5  and firmware incompatible.
New style software will not recognize  the pedals as plugged in. I have no access to update firmware because it does not see that pedals are plugged in.

The pedals do work in I racing but I can not calibrate of make setting adjustments like I could with the old software on my old computer.

Suggestions?

Thank You,
